channel.title: Looks way to good to be true
channel.description:
http://santrex.net/vpshosting.php
Is it a scam?
Honestly, this looks like an amazing deal to me..
Googled "Offshore vps hosting" and this was one of the first results

item.title: Looks way to good to be true
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:386188”]Live by this rule:
If it looks too good to be true, it is.

Anyway, webhostingtalk is a good place to check for hosts, for example this thread:

webhostingtalk.com

Santrex.net - Worst Host ever! | Web Hosting Talk

Web Hosting Talk


It might be worth it to play around on, but it doesn’t look like that good of a company, and they obviously oversell their resources by a lot.

edit:
http://www.thedave.ca/geek/santrex-net-worst-hosting-company-on-the-planet/[/quote]
Hmm good call mitb, google is my new best friend lawl

@horror good call as well

Read full topic
item.source: Looks way to good to be true

item.title: Looks way to good to be true
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

I wouldn’t trust a site with grammatical errors on it. Look at their “Cut Your Costs” box, they ended it with “This offer goes all of our services except dedicated servers!”. Sure, could have been a simple error, but you think they would have noticed and corrected it.

Read full topic
item.source: Looks way to good to be true
